Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I'm banging my head on the wall here. I've already tried the usual route a few times up to now (launcher -> Update -> Download Patcher -> run patcher individually or through the launcher) to no avail. It doesn't display any error of sort and actually tells me everything's ok and patched up.

Still, when I launch KSP... it show I'm on the old 1.0.5.1028 build. WTF. I'm using the KSP store version (bought long ago) and I literally don't understand why the hell it's telling me it did its job while it's clear that didn't happen...

Any ideas?

**thanks in advance for any reply!**

Hello Maserdom,

Can you tell me which OS are you running?

Which Patcher version?

@Maserdom are you trying to update to 1.1 from 1.0.5 by using the patcher? 

If so, that won't work, the patcher has been broken since, like, forever. Go to the KSP store (or wherever you bought it from) and download the whole game again. That will get you 1.1. Annoying, yes, but it's the way it is for now.
